alert.note: Alert for Bedford (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 23 at 3:14AM CST until further notice by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory is extended for the following rivers in Tennessee... Wartrace Creek Near Wartrace affecting Bedford County. For the Other Area Rivers...including Wartrace, Vernon...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Wartrace Creek Near Wartrace. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Water begins to inundate Winette Ayers Park. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:00 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 10.6 feet and rising. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Action stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 915 PM CST.
